metadata.title: Initialize Ray Worker on Each Hetzner Node

story.iWant: each Hetzner worker node to automatically join the Ray cluster on startup
story.soThat: tasks can be distributed to workers

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** a Hetzner worker node is provisioned 2. When** runner initializes 3. Then** Ray worker connects to head node at 10.0.0.1:6379 4. And** Ray worker registers with cluster 5. And** worker is visible in Ray dashboard 6. And** worker advertises max_concurrent = 2 (1 job per vCPU)
